label: Nav-Bar
template: <lumavate-nav-bar nav-bar-background-color="{{ componentData.navBarBackgroundColor }}" nav-bar-item-color="{{ componentData.navBarItemColor }}" nav-bar-items='[{"text":"{{ componentData.navBarItemText1 }}","linkTo":"{{componentData.navBarItemLink1.url}}","imageSource":{{componentData.navBarItemImageLink1|tojson}}},{"text":"{{ componentData.navBarItemText2 }}","linkTo":"{{componentData.navBarItemLink2.url}}","imageSource":{{componentData.navBarItemImageLink2|tojson}}},{"text":"{{ componentData.navBarItemText3 }}","linkTo":"{{componentData.navBarItemLink3.url}}","imageSource":{{componentData.navBarItemImageLink3|tojson}}},{"text":"{{ componentData.navBarItemText4 }}","linkTo":"{{componentData.navBarItemLink4.url}}","imageSource":{{componentData.navBarItemImageLink4|tojson}}}]'></lumavate-nav-bar>

label: Carousel

properties.helpText: Color of arrows used to switch displayed images.
properties.label: Arrow Color
properties.name: arrowColor

properties.helpText: This controls image size.  Contain scales the image as large as possible without cropping or stretching the image.  Cover scales the image with stretching the image, but may crop the image, in order to fill the element with no empty space.
properties.label: Mode
properties.name: mode

properties.helpText: Dots at the bottom of the image show which image in the series is being displayed.  This controls whether those dots are displayed or not.
properties.label: Display Dots
properties.name: displayDots

properties.helpText: When carousel image is displayed in fullscreen, if this property is set on, the icon to minimize the fullscreen image and the slide count are displayed below the header.  If it is off, the icons are displayed over the header.
properties.label: Lower Lightbox Icons
properties.name: lowerLightboxIcons

template: <lumavate-carousel lower-lightbox-icons="{{ componentData.lowerLightboxIcons|lower }}"  display-dots="{{ componentData.displayDots|lower }}" arrow-color="{{ componentData.arrowColor }}" mode="{{ componentData.mode }}" carousel-images='[{% set images = ['ImageLink1','ImageLink2','ImageLink3','ImageLink4','ImageLink5','ImageLink6']%}{% for imageId in images %}{{ ',' if imageId != 'ImageLink1' and componentData[imageId] and (componentData[imageId].preview != '/iot/v1/icons/no_image_available.png')}}{{ ('{"url": "' ~ componentData[imageId].preview ~ '"}') if  componentData[imageId] and (componentData[imageId].preview != '/iot/v1/icons/no_image_available.png')}}{% endfor %}]'></lumavate-carousel>

label: Header
template: <lumavate-header font-color="{{ componentData.fontColor }}" background-color="{{ componentData.backgroundColor }}" show-back-button="{{ componentData.showBackButton|lower }}" text="{{ componentData.text }}"></lumavate-header>

label: Disclosure

properties.helpText: Background color of the pop-up card telling users that the PWA uses cookies.
properties.label: Disclosure Background Color
properties.name: disclosureBackgroundColor

properties.helpText: Color of the text on the pop-up card telling users that the PWA uses cookies.
properties.label: Disclosure Text Color
properties.name: disclosureTextColor

properties.helpText: Text to let the user know that the PWA uses cookies and to make them aware that, by using the PWA, they are agreeing the use of cookies and to the privacy agreement.  Below this, links  can be placed to the privacy agreement and/or other important documents.
properties.label: Disclosure Text
properties.name: disclosureText

properties.helpText: Background color of the confirmation button.
properties.label: Button Color
properties.name: buttonColor

properties.helpText: Color of the text on the confirmation button.
properties.label: Button Text Color
properties.name: buttonTextColor

properties.helpText: Text written on the button used for confirmation.  Examples include: 'Got it!', 'Okay!', or 'Submit'.
properties.label: Button Text
properties.name: buttonText

properties.helpText: Displayed text listed below the disclosure statement that can be clicked to read important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement.
properties.label: Link 1 Text
properties.name: link1Text

properties.helpText: Color of the displayed text linking to important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement.
properties.label: Link 1 Text Color
properties.name: link1TextColor

properties.helpText: Web address of important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement, that the user needs to have access to.
properties.label: Link 1
properties.name: link1

properties.helpText: Displayed text listed below the disclosure statement that can be clicked to read important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement.  If more than one of these documents are not needed, this can be left blank.
properties.label: Link 2 Text
properties.name: link2Text

properties.helpText: Color of the displayed text linking to important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement.  If more than one of these documents are not needed, this can be left blank.
properties.label: Link 2 Text Color
properties.name: link2TextColor

properties.helpText: Web address of important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement, that the user needs to have access to.  If more than one of these documents are not needed, this can be left blank.
properties.label: Link 2
properties.name: link2

properties.helpText: Displayed text listed below the disclosure statement that can be clicked to read important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement.  If more than two of these documents are not needed, this can be left blank.
properties.label: Link 3 Text
properties.name: link3Text

properties.helpText: Color of the displayed text linking to important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement.  If more than two of these documents are not needed, this can be left blank.
properties.label: Link 3 Text Color
properties.name: link3TextColor

properties.helpText: Web address of important documents, such as a privacy or user agreement, that the user needs to have access to.  If more than two of these documents are not needed, this can be left blank.
properties.label: Link 3
properties.name: link3

template: <lumavate-disclosure button-color="{{ componentData.buttonColor}}" button-text="{{ componentData.buttonText}}" button-text-color="{{ componentData.buttonTextColor}}" disclosure-background-color="{{ componentData.disclosureBackgroundColor}}" disclosure-text="{{ componentData.disclosureText}}" disclosure-text-color="{{ componentData.disclosureTextColor}}" link-1-text="{{ componentData.link1Text}}" link-1="{{ componentData.link1.url}}" link-1-text-color="{{ componentData.link1TextColor}}" link-2-text="{{ componentData.link2Text}}" link-2="{{ componentData.link2.url}}" link-2-text-color="{{ componentData.link2TextColor}}" link-3-text="{{ componentData.link3Text}}" link-3="{{ componentData.link3.url}}" link-3-text-color="{{ componentData.link3TextColor}}"></lumavate-disclosure>

label: Map

properties.helpText: Type address to be shown on map in the form 'Street Adress and Street, City, State, Zip Code'
properties.label: Address
properties.name: address

properties.helpText: Type a Google Maps Embed API key.  You must include this to make a request to the API.  More information can be found about this at https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/embed/guide.
properties.label: Google Maps Embed API Key
properties.name: key

template: <lumavate-map address="{{ componentData.address }}" key="{{ componentData.key }}" zoom="{{ componentData.zoom }}"></lumavate-map>
